  • Method Details

    • loadScene

      private SceneController loadScene​(java.lang.String sceneName)
      Load the specified scene. If the scene is already shown, the scene is not reloaded
      Parameters:
      sceneName - the name of the fxml file to be loaded
      Returns:
      the scenecontroller of the loaded scene

    • loadScene

      private SceneController loadScene​(java.lang.String sceneName, boolean override)
      Load the specified scene
      Parameters:
      sceneName - the name of the fxml file to be loaded
      override - If true, if the scene is already shown, the scene is not reloaded
      Returns:
      the scenecontroller of the loaded scene

    • openModal

      private SceneController openModal​(java.lang.String sceneName, java.lang.String title, java.lang.Runnable onClose)
      Open a modal with the specified scene
      Parameters:
      sceneName - the name of the fxml file to load in the modal
      title - the tile of the opened modal
      onClose - the action to be executed when the modal is closed by the user
      Returns:
      return the scene controller associated to the scene

    • getPlayerBoardSceneController

      private PlayerboardSceneController getPlayerBoardSceneController()
      Returns the playerboard scene controller. This method is synchronized to check if the playerboard scene controller has already been created
      Returns:
      the scene controller of the playerboardScene controller

    • listLobbies

      public void listLobbies​(java.util.List<Triple<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer>> availableLobbies)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Shows the list of available lobbies
      Specified by:
      listLobbies in interface View
      Parameters:
      availableLobbies - a list of lobbies that the user can join. Each element of the list is a Triple composed as followed: - first: the name of the match - second: the number of players that have already joined the match - third: the maximum number of players that can join the match
